empty::clip_audio_1::goals[0]: Capture an action you'd like to tell a story about.
empty::text_card_4::text: Try to make the question more specific if you can.
empty::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Ask someone, what do you find interesting about this?
empty::text_card_5::text: The result can be another person reacting, or even the person who performed the first action.
empty::text_card_1::text: This path will walk you through the basic features of StoryMaker while you make your first story.
empty::howto_card_3::text: This is the Review Card it allows you to review your video, change the order, add a narration if you like, and publish it when you are ready.
empty::clip_video_1::goals[0]: Capture an action you'd like to tell a story about.
empty::text_card_6::text: Congratulations, you now know how to use four very important cards inside of StoryMaker!
empty::text_card_3::text: When you're telling a story with only three clips, it helps when they're each unique.
empty::howto_card_1::text: Excellent, you just selected your first milestone card. These progress you through the path, opening up new parts as you go. This is called a How To Card You'll see them around the app to help you out.
empty::clip_photo_1::goals[0]: Capture an action you'd like to tell a story about.
empty::clip_card_1::goals[0]: Capture what happened because of the first action.
empty::howto_card_2::text: Great lets add two more clips to make the story complete.
empty::text_card_0::text: This vertical collection of "cards" is called a "path". The cards are different in every story.
empty::title: Empty Path
empty::howto_card_0::text: Welcome to StoryMaker 2, scroll down to begin learning how to make your first video story.
empty::text_card_2::text: Next up are Clip Cards, these cards have suggested goals for you to help you produce a story.
